course.title: Computer Graphics
course.prerequisiteClasses: CMSC313, CMSC341 and MATH221 with a grade of C or better
course.description: An introduction to the fundamentals of interactive computer graphics. Topics include graphics hardware, line drawing, area filling, clipping, two-dimensional and three-dimensional geometrical transforms, three-dimensional perspective viewing, hidden surface removal, illumination, color and shading models.

course.title: Database Management Systems
course.prerequisiteClasses: CMSC341 or CMSC341H with the grade of C or better
course.description: This course covers database management and the different data models used to structure the logical view of databases. The course also covers database design and implementation techniques, including file organization, query processing, concurrency control, recovery, integrity and security.

course.title: Database Management Systems
course.prerequisiteClasses: CMSC341 or CMSC341H with the grade of C or better
course.description: This course covers database management and the different data models used to structure the logical view of databases.
